movies.overview: Three friends retreat to a resort to collaborate on a daring screenplay for a contest. Faced with the challenge of writing about passion despite their own dry spells, their journey soon blurs the line between imagination and experience.
movies.title: Kulong

movies.overview: Three compelling stories in one erotic experience. Yen Durano plays three different women in three titillating stories. In a collaboration of three directors: Roman Perez, Jr., Sigrid Polon, and Omar Deroca.
movies.title: EKS

movies.overview: Erik Matti’s classic Ekis gets a bold reboot with an all-girls ensemble led by Angela Morena, Cheena Dizon, and Aliya Raymundo. A crew of female thugs launches a kidnap-for-ransom plot, but when things go wrong, escaping the chaos becomes impossible.
movies.title: Ekis

movies.overview: Set in the Philippines during the 1940's, Celestina is a story about a woman, a burlesk dancer, who struggles to provide for her family while her husband is a gambling and womanizing drunkard. Despite the hardships, Celestina perseveres and finds strength in her love for her son.
movies.tagline: Malugod kayong inaanyayahan sa isang natatanging pagtatanghal ni...
movies.title: Celestina: Burlesk Dancer

movies.overview: A sultry woman who charms the hearts of men in a remote province. Dolores, a devoted wife to her paraplegic husband, falls for a young mountaineer. What begins as a reckless escape turns into an affair drenched in passion and secrecy.
movies.title: Ligaw

movies.overview: Catch the sexy Divine Villareal, Audrey Avila, and Reina Castillo, joined by fresh faces Rhea Montemayor and Chelsea Ylore, as they ignite this daring comedy about a groom desperate to fix his performance problem just days before his wedding.
movies.title: Kapag Tumayo Ang Testigo

movies.overview: Yuna, a woman engaged with her long time boyfriend, Nicco, starts to have second thoughts when she meets again her first love, Becca. Now she is torn between the man she loves and the woman she first loved.
movies.tagline: You’ll never forget your first love.
movies.title: First Taste

movies.overview: Rita, who finds herself alone when husband Ariel works abroad. They both find solace and sexual satisfaction in other people. When Ariel comes back, they both act like nothing happened. But will this keep their marriage from falling apart?
movies.title: Rita

movies.overview: Emma and Sandra, bound by loss and love, find solace and passion in each other while haunted by the illusions of their past. As reality and fantasy blur, they navigate guilt, desire, and the echoes of their late spouses. How long can they live in a world of make-believe?
movies.title: The Illusioned Ones

movies.overview: A wife learns that her husband who's in coma had an affair. She confronts the other woman but instead finds solace in her. She then realizes she's falling for her husband's mistress.
movies.title: Uhaw

movies.overview: When Eva gets involved in a steamy threesome with a houseboy and her lady boss, she realizes she has to choose only one between them.
movies.title: Eva

movies.overview: Two high school friends turned sugar babies, who sacrifice everything for each other. Until love gets in the way
movies.title: Sugar Baby

movies.overview: A steamy tale of love, lust, and betrayal. When Adele's sister Bea returns with her girlfriend Cheska, a secret affair begins between Cheska and Adele's boyfriend, Rener, leading to a climactic ending when they're caught.
movies.title: Kiskisan

movies.overview: A steamy tale of a young woman’s awakening. After her first encounter with her crush, Alexa learns to use her body to take control in a world that ignores her—until her secret life spirals into scandal and betrayal.
movies.title: Akin Ang Gabi

movies.overview: A group of friends sets out on a thrilling trip to Vietnam, but their adventure turns dangerous when one of them is found dead, sparking suspense, secrets, and unexpected tension.
movies.title: Sem Break

movies.overview: A photographer is tasked to take a photo of a rare flower thriving in the mountain, but he discovers women trapped in a hidden brothel for illegal loggers.
movies.title: Virgin Forest

movies.overview: Five robbers break into an actress’ house but a bloody encounter with the police happens leaving two robbers alive. Having no choice, they hide inside the house and discover that everything was planned.
movies.title: House Tour

movies.overview: When Romina learns that her husband has been cheating on her, she turns to the town’s folk healer for help and obtains a love potion. But it seems the potion is working on everyone except her husband.
movies.title: Huwad

movies.overview: Get ready to AROUSE your senses! Hosted by Aiko Garcia and Jenn Rosa, this steamy special brings you the hottest, most unforgettable scenes from VMX’s A-list sirens—AJ Raval, Ayanna Misola, Azi Acosta & more. Desire, passion, and pure heat—are you ready?
movies.title: Arouse

movies.overview: Four lives become intertwined because of one goal - to exact revenge. Things turn bloodier and more chaotic when they all realize who the real mastermind is.
movies.title: Ganti-Ganti

last_episode_to_air.name: The Answer
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jay-Jay digs deeper to find out the truth about her father, all while the competition between Keifer and Yuri intensifies. As Keifer stakes his claim, Yuri stands his ground. Jay-Jay, caught in between, finally gives her answer.

tv_shows.name: The Jewel of Section E
tv_shows.overview: Jay-jay, the only girl in the mischievous Section E, hopes for a fresh start in high school but quickly becomes the target of her rowdy male classmates' pranks and schemes to make her leave. Dubbed their "Mutya" (muse), she fights back with wit and charm, turning the tables on her tormentors. Amidst the chaos, unexpected friendships blossom, and hilarious misunderstandings lead to heart-fluttering moments. Can Jay-jay survive the madness of Section E, or will she win over their hearts instead?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Jay-jay, the only girl in the mischievous Section E, hopes for a fresh start in high school but quickly becomes the target of her rowdy male classmates' pranks and schemes to make her leave. Dubbed their "Mutya", she fights back with wit and charm, turning the tables on her tormentors. Amidst the chaos, unexpected friendships blossom, and hilarious misunderstandings lead to heart-fluttering moments. Can Jay-jay survive the madness of Section E, or will she win over their hearts instead?

seasons.name: Book 2 (The Dark Side)
seasons.overview: The viral Wattpad series that gave birth to the newest young stars of today is finally back! In this season, Jay-jay finally feels like she belongs to Section E now. But just when things are falling into place, she learns about Keifer's plan.

last_episode_to_air.name: Exposed
last_episode_to_air.overview: Brian decides to dress as a Drag Queen in an attempt to win Amber back. Kate removes Allaine from their group chat. P. Corny unveils a dark secret during the announcement at Vanguard High, sparking anger among the majority of students. Now, it is time for Paco to make a choice about whom he truly loves.

tv_shows.name: High (School) On Sex
tv_shows.overview: Wilbert Ross and Denise Esteban. Vivamax brings lots of laughs and loads of sexy time in its new series, “High (School) on Sex”, pronounced as High On Sex,

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: "Boy Bastos" star Wilbert Ross reunites with "Crush Kong Curly" director GB Sampedro for another hilariously sexy coming-of-age series. With Denise Esteban, Migs Almendras, Angela Morena and Kat Dovey. This hot barkada will take you high. High on love, high on sex.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: New students, new school, new drama, new gossips, but more naughty and way more fun experiences. High school life has never been this wild!

tv_shows.name: Batang Quiapo
tv_shows.overview: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighborhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

tv_shows.name: Brothers
tv_shows.overview: Ador is a well known and respected CIDG Police Official, with a loving family as his support. Cardo, on the other hand, loves the solitude of the mountains in the province as a SAF Trooper. Their lives take a sudden turn when Ador gets himself entangled in a syndicate by being betrayed by one of his own colleagues, resulting to his death. To conceal this fact, Cardo was ordered to pretend to be Ador and finish the mission what his brother left behind. He will also be force to pretend to his brother's family and friends, and be re-united with his grandmother, whom he despised, for assuming she abandoned him.

tv_shows.name: TBONX
tv_shows.overview: TBON Production

last_episode_to_air.name: The Lovely Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: The lovely ladies get involved in a life-threatening altercation that causes Madam Lovely to get tired of all the troubles that they bring. Is it the end of their stay or will their sexy mess continue?

tv_shows.name: Lovely Ladies Dormitory
tv_shows.overview: Five modern women live together in one roof as they deal with their families, career, and men and explore their colorful sex lives.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Five modern women live together in one roof as they deal with their families, career, and men; and explore their colorful sex lives.

tv_shows.name: Pinoy Big Brother: Celebrity Edition
tv_shows.overview: The celebrity edition of the reality game show "Pinoy Big Brother" features Filipino Celebrity housemates live together, share their stories and build meaningful relationships as they do tasks and challenges supervised by Big Brother. Every week a nomination is done, and the public decides who gets evicted and eventually become the Big Winner of the program.

seasons.name: Celebrity Edition 1
seasons.overview: The first celebrity season of the Philippine television reality show Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Celebrity Edition 2
seasons.overview: The second celebrity season of the Philippine television reality show Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Celebrity Collab Edition
seasons.overview: The third celebrity season of the Philippine television reality show Pinoy Big Brother marks two major milestones: it is the first season to air on GMA and the first full celebrity edition since 2008. In celebration of its 20th anniversary, Pinoy Big Brother shines brighter than ever with 'PBB Celebrity Collab Edition,' a groundbreaking collaboration between ABS-CBN and GMA that brings together artists from both Star Magic and Sparkle as its newest housemates.

seasons.name: Celebrity Collab Edition 2.0
seasons.overview: The fourth celebrity season of the Philippine television reality show Pinoy Big Brother, the historic collaboration between ABS-CBN and GMA, continues as Bahay ni Kuya opens its doors once again, featuring the rising Gen Z stars from Star Magic and Sparkle GMA Artist Center.

tv_shows.name: Dear Utol
tv_shows.overview: "Dear Utol" is a Filipino series where a charismatic older male figure offers advice and entertainment, tackling everyday dilemmas with wisdom and humor

tv_shows.name: Wow Mani
tv_shows.overview: Get ready to laugh, blush, and maybe sweat a little with the ultimate sexy comedy gag show packed with steamy skits and segments, guaranteed to tickle your funny bone and turn up the heat!

tv_shows.name: Di Ba't Ikaw
tv_shows.overview: Di Ba't Ikaw is a drama series produced by GMA Network, Inc. and directed by Maryo J. delos Reyes. The series featured Jessa Zaragoza, Jao Mapa and Jomari Yllana as the lead cast. It was launched May 15, 1999 Saturday with 1 hour telecast. May 17, 1999 it started its regular telecast. It replaced Del Tierro in Telebabad block.

tv_shows.name: Pinoy Big Brother
tv_shows.overview: The Philippine adaptation of the reality game show "Big Brother" features Filipino housemates live together, share their stories and build meaningful relationships as they do tasks and challenges supervised by Big Brother. Every week a nomination is done, and the public decides who gets evicted and eventually become the Big Winner of the program.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The first civilian edition and the inaugural season of the reality television series Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Celebrity Edition 1
seasons.overview: The first celebrity edition and the second overall season of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Teen Edition 1
seasons.overview:
The first teen edition and the third overall season of Pinoy Big Brother.

It closely resembled the original Pinoy Big Brother format, unlike the relatively short Teen Big Brother, its British counterpart.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second civilian edition and fourth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Celebrity Edition 2
seasons.overview: The second celebrity edition and the fifth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Teen Edition Plus
seasons.overview: The second teen edition and the sixth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Double Up
seasons.overview:
The third civilian edition and the seventh season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

The season featured franchise-defining twists and storylines, including two houses with their own sets of housemates, sets of secret twins as housemates, house competitions between houses, a merge of the two houses, and an increase in finalists from the regular four to five.

seasons.name: Teen Clash 2010
seasons.overview: The third teen edition and the eighth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Unlimited
seasons.overview: The fourth civilian edition and the ninth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Teen Edition 4
seasons.overview: The fourth teen edition and the tenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: All In
seasons.overview:
The first special edition, fifth regular edition, and eleventh season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

For the first time in the history of Big Brother worldwide, civilian adults, Celebrities, and Teen housemates lived together inside the Big Brother house and competed against each other to become the next Big Winner.

The sixth regular edition and twelfth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

The season is a two-part season featuring a teen and civilian editions aired consecutively.

seasons.name: Lucky 7
seasons.overview:
The seventh regular edition and thirteenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

This season is subdivided into four parts, with the first part being a Celebrity Edition, followed by a Teen Edition, and then a Civilian Edition. The fourth part was revealed as the Dream Team, an all-stars like edition where finalists and wildcards from each batch returned for the series' final part towards the Big Night finale.

seasons.name: Otso
seasons.overview:
The eighth regular edition and fourteenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

The special format divided the season into four batches and an ultimate batch. Batch 1 consisted of Teen housemates, Batch 2 consisted of Civilian Adult housemates, Batch 3 consisted of another set of Teens, and Batch 4 consisted of the second set of Civilian Adults.

seasons.name: Connect
seasons.overview: The ninth regular edition and fifteenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

seasons.name: Kumunity 10
seasons.overview:
The tenth regular edition and sixteenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

Pinoy Big Brother returns in partnership with Kumu. Three communities are slated to enter the PBB House this season—the celebrities, regular adults, and teens.

seasons.name: Gen 11
seasons.overview:
The eleventh regular edition and seventeenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

Welcoming a diverse group of Gen Z housemates, Pinoy Big Brother’s leGENdary yellow house reopens with a whirlwind of tasks and challenges to crown the next Big Winner of Pinoy Big Brother. Brace yourselves for a Gen Z revolution!

seasons.name: Celebrity Collab Edition
seasons.overview:
The third celebrity edition and the eighteenth season overall of Pinoy Big Brother.

For the first time in Pinoy Big Brother history, the two biggest media networks in the country, ABS-CBN and GMA Network, joined forces.

last_episode_to_air.name: Daddy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Robert and Keo infiltrate the motel and discover a deadly secret society and the sadistic orchestrator of Sex Hub. Robert and Keo’s reunion with Carmine turns for the worse when they are forced into one final heinous sex act before any chance of escape.

tv_shows.name: Sex Hub
tv_shows.overview: Sex hub is about a daughter entrapped in a sinister sex streaming house where captives are forced to perform sexual acts for online tips, and a father who races to rescue his daughter.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Leon and Edgar finally face each other. But when Edgar is about to kill Leon, he is surprised by a big revelation about the death of his sister, Erlinda.

tv_shows.name: Araro
tv_shows.overview: Edgar plans to exact revenge to Leon by charming and seducing all the women in his life.

last_episode_to_air.name: 30-Day Notice to Forever
last_episode_to_air.overview: An unfortunate incident pushes Kim over the edge, prompting her to reassess her readiness for marriage with her former boss. With Cyrus' help, Brandon orchestrates one final surprise to reaffirm his love and commitment to his bride-to-be.

tv_shows.name: What's Wrong With Secretary Kim
tv_shows.overview: A competent secretary and a narcissistic boss fall in love while uncovering a traumatic past that causes them to question whether their feelings are real or the result of a shared trauma.

last_episode_to_air.name: Officially Yours
last_episode_to_air.overview: Via and Arkin officially tell their friends and loved ones of their relationship. But upon meeting Clea, her insecurity starts to creep up.

tv_shows.name: Golden Scenery of Tomorrow
tv_shows.overview: Though very different, simple wallflower Via and the charming Arkin have been best friends since they were kids. But when that friendship turns into love, will it be strong enough to keep them together through Arkin’s fame that’s bound to lead them to very different roads?

tv_shows.name: Alyna
tv_shows.overview: Alyna is a Philippine romantic-drama TV series aired by ABS-CBN. It is the 13th installment of the Precious Hearts Romances series. The series is based on the pocket book Dominic by Martha Cecilia. It is directed by FM Reyes.

last_episode_to_air.name: The Real Untold Story Begins
last_episode_to_air.overview: The world premiere of "The Real Untold Story of Josephine Bracken" draws the Philippine movie industry's biggest names.

tv_shows.name: The Woman in the Septic Tank 3: The Real Untold Story of Josephine Bracken
tv_shows.original_name: Ang Babae sa Septic Tank 3: The Real Untold Story of Josephine Bracken
tv_shows.overview: "Sequel na, series pa? It's just a suggestion." Watch as Eugene Domingo comes full circle as she completes the saga in this third installment of Ang Babae Sa Septic Tank. Witness her in a new light as she tells the real untold story of Josephine Bracken in this iWant original series.

tv_shows.name: Pulang Araw
tv_shows.overview: Red Sun is a family drama that tells stories of courage, sacrifice, and hardships that every Filipino family has. These stories were inspired by the tales of the unsung heroes who defied the odds of World War II and the Japanese occupation of the Philippines.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Caught in the middle of World War II, four friends navigate love, hope, and heartbreak under the shadow of Japanese rule in the Philippines.

tv_shows.name: Joyride
tv_shows.overview: Joyride is the story of young people on a journey of self-discovery, friendship and love as they go through teenage life on their way to young adulthood. Directed by Mac Alejandre, Joyride is a fresh, touching, sometimes heartbreaking and often amusing look at teenage life. And because it is more than just about being teens, Joyride tackles the story of different young people and their families who managed to ride along with drama of life. In 2005-2006, the series was re-aired on GMA Pinoy TV worldwide. From October 20, 2011 until December 29, 2011 the series was re-aired on GMA Life TV worldwide.

tv_shows.name: Sa Dulo Ng Walang Hanggan
tv_shows.overview: Sa Dulo ng Walang Hanggan is a Philippine primetime drama teleserye aired from 26 March 2001 to 28 February 2003 by ABS-CBN.
